page.title: 05A day in the life of my Dad
page.content: My dad is a lorry driver and mechanic.He has to get up at 6 o'clock in the morning when he is working.He goes down to the yard to see his boss who will then tell him whether he wants him driving or mending one of the lorries.He goes to one of the trucks(Daf 3800)and checks over the engine,water oil and diesel.He then gets out his maps and plans his route.By 7.30 he is on the road and will have a rest break after about 4 hours.After delivering his load the lorry is loaded up again.Dad tries to get a delivery near to the yard so that he can come home.When he does get home he is very tired.
